sources.title: A Stranger in Town (1967) Spaghetti Western by Luigi Vanzi | Starring Tony Anthony
sources.description:
A lone gunfighter attempts to make a deal with a Mexican bandit to split a shipment of stolen gold, resulting in a brutal game of double-cross between the two parties.

Original title: Un dollaro tra i denti (1967)

Director: Luigi Vanzi
Writers: Warren Garfield, Giuseppe Mangione
Stars: Tony Anthony, Jolanda Modio, Raf Baldassarre
Genres: Italian-American, Spaghetti Western


00:00 Full movie with subtitles: A mysterious stranger rides into a tense and dangerous town.
07:36 The stranger defies threats and stays in town, earning unwanted attention from Aguilar’s gang.
23:05 Aguilar takes control of the town, showcasing his power over the locals.
35:10 The stranger cunningly allies with Aguilar under the guise of a mutual gold heist.
49:36 The stranger outwits Aguilar and his men during a tense negotiation over stolen gold.
1:04:12 A daring escape leads to a fiery showdown as alliances shatter under pressure.
1:18:20 The stranger confronts Aguilar in a final, high-stakes duel for justice and survival.
1:25:08 The story concludes with a moral twist as the stranger reveals his true identity and purpose.

@CultCinemaClassics 

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=UUMOycDFnpMeWzaITQSD1dWsOA

metadata.Plot: Unknown to anybody else but himself The Stranger arrives in an abandoned town where he witnesses the slaughter of Mexican soldiers by a gang led by Aguila. The Stranger threatens Aguila to denounce him if he does not accept to let him take part in the theft of a shipment of gold. The plan is a success but when The Stranger claims his due, he gets a good beating instead. However The Stranger manages to escape with the gold. The bandits, who want his skin, pursue him. But The Stranger is not the kind to get caught so easily...
metadata.Actors: Tony Anthony, Jolanda Modio, Raf Baldassarre
